citations.narrative:
The enclosure that houses two guinea pigs has two wooden housing structures that have damaged wood. One structure
has chewed wood around the entrance and the other has a section of the top missing on the edge. Additionally, this
structure had an obvious liquid stain on the top. Both of these structures are in disrepair and are not substantially
impervious to moisture. Damaged wooden structures and surfaces that absorb moisture cannot be appropriately
sanitized. These damaged structures should be repaired or replaced in order for them to be structurally sound and
substantially impervious to moisture. Enclosures, including their racks, shelving and other accessories, shall be
constructed of smooth material substantially impervious to liquids and moisture.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: MAY 31, 2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the manager and facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Jeffrey Shepherd, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n

narrative:
3.28(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The enclosure that houses two guinea pigs has two wooden housing structures that have damaged wood.  One structure 
has chewed wood around the entrance and the other has a section of the top missing on the edge.  Additionally, this 
structure had an obvious liquid stain on the top.  Both of these structures are in disrepair and are not substantially 
impervious to moisture.  Damaged wooden structures and surfaces that absorb moisture cannot be appropriately 
sanitized.  These damaged structures should be repaired or replaced in order for them to be structurally sound and 
substantially impervious to moisture.  Enclosures, including their racks, shelving and other accessories, shall be 
constructed of smooth material substantially impervious to liquids and moisture.  
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY:  MAY 31, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the manager and facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jeffrey Shepherd, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
